map_grid.description:
The room you entered appears to be empty,
such a disappointment..

You enter a dark room.
You shine your torch towards the center of
 the room but you find it to be empty.
No luck this time...

It's your lucky day!
This room has nothing but gold for you.

Something in the distance catches your eye..
something shimmering..
something made out of gold!

You enter a room but you are instantly
greated by an angry snarl, looks like trouble!
You see a treasure in the distance!

You loudly stumble into a room,
big mistake!

It's your lucky day!
This room has nothing but gold for you.

You tread carefully into a dark room,
suddenly you hear a sound behind you.

As you enter the room several enemies are waiting for you!
Stand and fight or run?

You tread carefully into a dark room,
suddenly you hear a sound behind you.

You enter a room and the light from your torch
reflects off something made out of gold..
You found a treasure!

You tread carefully into a dark room,
suddenly you hear a sound behind you.
You see a treasure in the distance!

You enter a dark room.
You shine your torch towards the center of
 the room but you find it to be empty.

This room looks empty,
you sigh and move on.
